110 Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE Ron,
I wanted to follow up from our conversation a few months ago. I know you were giving some consideration to using MBO on an upcoming contract. Any update would be great.
Regards,
Steve ___________________________________ Steve Arhancet Director, Enrollments and Market Development MBO Partners
t: 703.793.6011 f: 703.793.6081 m: 540.560.8837 e: sarhancet@mbopartners.com w: www.mbopartners.com
